thread.title: The BeyHive Thinks Beyoncé Secretly Hinted She Was Expecting Twins Last December
thread.title_full: The BeyHive Thinks Beyoncé Secretly Hinted She Was Expecting Twins Last December

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: The BeyHive Thinks Beyoncé Secretly Hinted She Was Expecting Twins Last December
text:
Beyoncé made the ~WORLD STOP~ on Wednesday after announcing she and Jay Z are expecting twins by sharing the most beautiful pregnancy snap ever. But according to a few eagle-eyed members of the BeyHive, it might just be possible that the Queen Bee actually gave us a hint about her pregnancy via Instagram a couple months ago.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below We would like to share our love and happiness. We have been blessed two times over. We are incredibly grateful that our family will be growing by two, and we thank you for your well wishes. - The Carters
A photo posted by Beyoncé (@beyonce) on Feb 1, 2017 at 10:39am PST
Thanks to a deep analysis of Bey's Christmas gift to the universe — a slideshow of photos of her looking flawless while wearing a suede navy dress and silver antlers — super-fan sleuths have noticed that in back-to-back photos, Beyoncé appears to hold her stomach, then hold up the peace sign (a.k.a., the number two), then make a heart with her hands.
A video posted by Beyoncé (@beyonce) on Dec 17, 2016 at 8:05pm PST
Could it possibly be this was Bey's super sneaky way of telling us she was expecting twins?! That's for y'all to decide — but clearly, it's a theory quite a few people are loving.
